name: COMMONWEALTH ex rel. RICKY B., Petitioner, v. William A. DWYER, Jr., Judge, Court of Common Pleas, Philadelphia County, Family Division
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. Ricky B. v. Dwyer

parties: COMMONWEALTH ex rel. RICKY B., Petitioner, v. William A. DWYER, Jr., Judge, Court of Common Pleas, Philadelphia County, Family Division.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Petition for Writ of Prohibition is dismissed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Judith B. Chomsky, Marsha Levick, Philadelphia, for petitioner.
Charles W. Johns, Howland W. Abramson, Philadelphia, for respondent.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Harry Tischler, Philadelphia, for Commonwealth (amicus curiae).
casebody.head_matter:
424 A.2d 504
COMMONWEALTH ex rel. RICKY B., Petitioner, v. William A. DWYER, Jr., Judge, Court of Common Pleas, Philadelphia County, Family Division.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 27, 1981.
Judith B. Chomsky, Marsha Levick, Philadelphia, for petitioner.
Charles W. Johns, Howland W. Abramson, Philadelphia, for respondent.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Harry Tischler, Philadelphia, for Commonwealth (amicus curiae).
